welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Orly, France! Get ready to experience the charming streets, delicious cuisine, and rich history this beautiful city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Orly has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Orly Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free and unlimited access for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building with domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
